tool_description: Identifies and assesses fire risks from chemical storage, processes, and hazardous materials on property.

chemical_inventory.description: List of chemicals present (use common names or CAS numbers)

storage_methods.description: Storage methods used (cabinets, tanks, drums, shelving, etc.)

ventilation_type.description: Ventilation system for chemical areas (natural, mechanical, fume hood, none)

chemical_processes.description: Chemical processes conducted (mixing, heating, distillation, etc.)

emergency_shower_eyewash.description: Presence of emergency shower and eyewash stations

error_messages: Chemical identification error: Provide specific chemical names or CAS numbers, not generic terms.
Storage method error: Specify actual storage methods (safety cabinets, outdoor tanks, etc.).
Invalid ventilation type: Use natural, mechanical, fume hood, or none.
Process description error: Be specific about chemical processes (heating, mixing, distillation, etc.).
Inventory limit exceeded: Maximum 100 chemicals can be analyzed in single assessment.
usage: Provide chemical_inventory (can be empty array if no chemicals), storage_methods, ventilation_type, and spill_containment status. Include chemical_processes and emergency_shower_eyewash for industrial facilities.
